-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(255),Zone VARCHAR(255),service_zone VARCHAR(255)) 
    
    AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
'

create DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery

alter DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIRSTROW=1,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT 1,Borough VARCHAR(255) 2,Zone VARCHAR(255) 3,service_zone VARCHAR(255) 4) 
    
    AS [result]


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net'
)

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(255),Zone VARCHAR(255),service_zone VARCHAR(255)) 
    
    AS [result]

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)   

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(255),Zone VARCHAR(255),service_zone VARCHAR(255)) 
    
    AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
'    


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (date_key INT,date DATE,year SMALLINT,month SMALLINT,day SMALLINT,
        day_name varchar(20),day_of_year SMALLINT,week_of_month SMALLINT,
        week_of_year SMALLINT,month_name VARCHAR(15),year_month INT,year_week INT) 
    
    AS [result]








 

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (date_key INT,date DATE,year SMALLINT,month SMALLINT,day SMALLINT,
        day_name varchar(20),day_of_year SMALLINT,week_of_month SMALLINT,
        week_of_year SMALLINT,month_name VARCHAR(15),year_month INT,year_week INT) 
    
    AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_type.tsv',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR='\t'
    ) AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_type.tsv'',
        FORMAT = ''csv'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=''\t''
    ) AS [result]
'    

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_type.tsv',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR='\t'
    ) 
    WITH (trip_type INT,trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)) 
    
    AS [result]



SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR='\t'
    ) 
    WITH (trip_type INT,trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)) 
    
    AS [result]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Reading Data from JSON file with line formate

---{"payment_type":1,"payment_type_desc":"Credit card"}
---{"payment_type":2,"payment_type_desc":"Cash"}
---{"payment_type":3,"payment_type_desc":"No charge"}
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
select payment_type,derscription
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (payment_type TINYINT,derscription VARCHAR(25) '$.payment_type_desc');

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Reading Data from JSON file with Array Formate

---{"payment_type":4,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Dispute"}]}
---{"payment_type":5,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Unknown"}, {"sub_type":2, "value":"Unavailable"}]}
---{"payment_type":6,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Voided trip"}]}
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    
--Reading Data from JSON file with Array Formate using open json

select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (payment_type TINYINT,payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON )
     CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
     WITH (Description VARCHAR(25) '$.value');

USE nyc_taxi_discovery

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv' , 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name, result.filepath() as file_path, count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    group by result.filename(),result.filepath() 
    order by 1 
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    group by result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    order by 1 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    where result.filepath(1)=2020 and result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
    group by result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    order by 1 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
